data.text: @Slooties @BentTango @cmail_sport You bet your health on a company that paid the largest criminal fine in history?  Good luck, you can't undo that decision.
@BackupGeordie @DJJOOCE @andocom @Dam_sega @cmail_sport Listing an appendix screenshot with no source isn't proof. Send the actual study and articles for me to read rather than a blurry screenshot
@Sharky_vs_Evil @cmail_sport @DrAseemMalhotra Isn’t the vac supposed to protect from serious illness to covid?  He’s a young athlete, ultra low risk to covid, why’d he get the vax in the first pace?

@Koover88 @BentTango @cmail_sport https://t.co/pbCTfNj7Il) my viewpoint is based upon a study analysing millions of individuals. I have no idea what your viewpoint is derived from. Feel free to share some sources, studies etc. And I'll have a read and further educate myself

@Jonatha12700852 @BentTango @cmail_sport Rather than accusing me of spreading misinformation, why don't you share the study you reference rather than a screenshot with no context. https://t.co/pbCTfNj7Il) here is the article I read to demonstrate that Myocarditis is more likely in the unvaxxed than the vaccinated

@Jonatha12700852 @BentTango @cmail_sport I'm not understanding the screenshot. We have two bar graphs showing an increase in Myocarditis in both an absolute and relative sense (these make sense because we now have Covid and vaccines present) then we have a pie chart with no relevance to the bar charts at all.
@PPatrick007 @BentTango @cmail_sport https://t.co/pbCTfNj7Il) this is what made me say it.
@kri8or @BentTango @cmail_sport https://t.co/pbCTfNj7Il) have a read. Cute to insult someone and provide absolutely no evidence whatsoever, not surprising though in this day and age.
